dcterms:creator: N. Peng
H. Poon
C. Quirk
K. Toutanova
W. Yih
dcterms:description: The PubMed dataset contains 6987 ternary instances about drug-gene-mutation relations and 6087 binary instances about drug-mutation sub-relations, primarily used for cross-sentence n-ary relation extraction.
dcterms:title: PubMed

dcterms:creator: I. Hendrickx
S. N. Kim
Z. Kozareva
P. Nakov
D. ´O. S´eaghdha
S. Pad´o
M. Pennacchiotti
L. Romano
S. Szpakowicz
dcterms:description: The SemEval 2010 Task 8 dataset consists of 8,000 instances for training and 2,171 instances for testing, containing 9 directed relations and a special Other class, used for sentence-level relation extraction.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2010 Task 8

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
V. Zhong
D. Chen
G. Angeli
C. D. Manning
dcterms:description: The TACRED dataset contains over 106k instances and includes 41 relation types and a special no relation class, used for sentence-level relation extraction.
dcterms:title: TACRED
